name: Galaxy Ball (itch)
description:
Enjoy watching the background stars and the galaxy. "Galaxy Ball" is a very simple 1 tap game that is very addictive. You will definitely enjoy this galaxy ball game. All you need to do is to hit the red asteroids with your galaxy ball and to gain more scores hit the asteroids from above and it will trigger the "Galaxy Effect". 

Game Features:
-Cute sound effects
-Very cool Galaxy effect
-Simple game
-galaxy ball 1 tap left and right movement

ENJOY PLAYING GALAXY BALL!!
